info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 17 at 4:59PM MDT until July 17 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of western Texas, including the following county, El Paso.
* WHEN...Until 700 PM MDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 457 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 0.3 and 0.75 inches of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall of up to 0.5 to 0.75 inches is expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Central El Paso and the UTEP area. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING
